1.product_name: Hello Bello Diapers, Size 1 (8-12 lbs) Wild Cats, 128 Count Value Pack of Premium Disposable Baby Diapers, Hypoallergenic with Soft, Cloth-Like Feel

1.name: Ang
1.date: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2025
1.title: Great quality - switched from Honest
1.review:
I was hesitant to switch from Honest to Hello Bello but I honestly am so impressed with the quality! These are just as absorbent as the Honest brand and have the same quality, no toxic chemicals, no fragrance. It is perfect. They have cute designs just like Honest does too and for a much better price! I’m happy I tried these for my baby.

I see people in the reviews complain about them not being as absorbent as they would like but personally, I would never keep my baby in even a wet diaper knowing he’s uncomfortable. I have an 11 week old baby that sleeps through the night and he doesn’t wake up in discomfort not once for diaper change but he also rarely soils the diaper at night.

Hope this helps other parents!

2.name: Chelsie Anguiano
2.date: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2025
2.title: great diapers
2.review:
I’m incredibly impressed with **Hello Bello Diapers in Size 3 (Wild Cats design)**! They offer a perfect combination of style, comfort, and performance. The adorable wild cats print is such a fun touch that makes diaper changes more cheerful.

**Absorbency:** These diapers are highly absorbent and can last through long naps and even overnight without leaks. They do an excellent job of keeping my little one dry and comfortable.

**Fit:** The size 3 diapers fit my baby (17 lbs) perfectly, with a snug yet gentle fit around the waist and legs. The stretchy tabs make it easy to get a secure fit, which prevents leaks while allowing my baby to move freely.

**Softness:** The material is super soft, which is important for sensitive baby skin. We haven’t had any issues with diaper rashes or irritation since switching to Hello Bello.

**Eco-Conscious:** I also love that Hello Bello prioritizes being eco-friendly while maintaining affordability. It’s nice knowing these diapers are made with plant-based ingredients without sacrificing quality.

**Value:** The 100-count value pack is such a great deal. It’s convenient not having to buy diapers as often, and I appreciate the quality at this price point.

Overall, I highly recommend **Hello Bello Diapers** for any parent looking for a high-quality, stylish, and reliable diaper option. It’s a win-win for both baby and parent!

3.name: D. Luu
3.date: Reviewed in the United States on February 24, 2025
3.title: good quality but wetness detector not so intuitive
3.review: Decent quality diapers, easy to strap on the velcro to secure diaper. Contains pee and poo easily but blowouts can still occur. The wetness indicator is not as intuitive though being a shade of green or yellow when changing and starts out at yellow. Other brand diapers just have it change to blue for wet, not these it seems.

4.name: Bob Dugas
4.date: Reviewed in the United States on February 16, 2025
4.title: Simply Diapers
4.review:
These are used when our grand daughter comes over. They are sized appropriately and fit fine. As far as absorbency and holding everything in, they do an average job. Not quite as good as the more expensive brands like pampers, but they do a good job for their price. We don't get excited about any design on them, since they are just disposable diapers and are often under clothing, but the design is cute.

The closure holds tight and have not let go even once. No issue with chaffing or binding around the legs. We like them and will consider them when we have to buy more.

5.name: Jared N.
5.date: Reviewed in the United States on February 19, 2025
5.title: Luxury diaper with the cutest patterns
5.review: We have always thought about switching to HelloBello but have stayed with our usual diaper brand. Now that we have our third and final kid, we thought we would try something new and wow - these did not disappoint. These diapers were soft and felt like a luxurious splurge, even though they were very affordable. The leak protection and absorbency is comparable to other brands. These diapers seem to run slightly smaller than other brands, but that isn’t a deal breaker. Having the fun patterns on them seals the deal.

6.name: CAM
6.date: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2025
6.title: Wish I’d have tried these sooner
6.review: This was my first time using hello Bello diapers for my now almost 3-year-old. I think that these have become my favorite diapers. Not only do they seem to have a great amount of absorbing space, but I noticed that the front is not wet when he pees a bunch like other brands where sometimes the pee will continue to soak through the front or sides of the diaper. There is no smell, and there is no pee smell after they’ve been used. They did not cause any form of chafing on my active boy. I truly think that these are great diapers and will continue to get them!!

7.name: Dolly
7.date: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2025
7.title: Good Diaper
7.review: These Hello Bello Diapers are so cute with the cat print design. I found the diaper to do a good job at being snug at the right areas and the side tabs fit securely. I like that these diapers are hypoallergenic and are made with better plant-based ingredients. They work well for day use but I don't find them as absorbent for overnight use.

8.name: ESIII
8.date: Reviewed in the United States on February 21, 2025
8.title: Nice diaper
8.review:
I ordered these for my nephew. They work great. They fit him nicely and from what I can tell they work just as well as other name brand diapers. He hasn't had any leaks and he's pretty active.

Not much more to say about a diaper. It gets the job done.

9.name: Victoriahannah
9.date: Reviewed in the United States on November 23, 2024
9.title: They are ok
9.review: I don’t love them. Only the back stretches which ends up leaving a gap on my babies behind.

10.name: Miranda Perry
10.date: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2025
10.title: Cute but cheap
10.review: I have 4 children in diapers, and you’re better off with Huggies or Pampers. These leak so incredibly bad.

11.name: CL
11.date: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2025
11.title: These diapers are amazing!
11.review: They’re super soft and gentle on my baby’s sensitive skin. The flower child design is adorable, and they’re surprisingly absorbent, even overnight. I love that they’re hypoallergenic and have a cloth-like feel. A great choice for parents looking for premium quality at a reasonable price.

12.name: MC
12.date: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2025
12.title: Not a daily go to
12.review: While these diapers are very cute and are a nice alternative to the mass produced versions, they simply don’t seem to be as absorbent as the name brands.

13.name: JB
13.date: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2025
13.title: Cute diapers
13.review: These Hello Bello diapers are s super cute. They are soft and seem comfortable for the baby. I like that they are hypoallergenic and don't seem to cause any skin irritation. So far these have been holding up very well, no leaks at all. When comparing with other popular brands, these stand out as the superior for us. The price point is a bit higher than some others, but the overall Hello Bello brand has become our favorite for all baby and children's products.

14.name: Lamatzue102002
14.date: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2025
14.title: Functional and more
14.review: It is pleasing to open this box of diapers and be greeted with a colorful display as opposed to plain white. As least you are diverted from the task at hand for a little while. The diapers are soft and I love that they are hypoallergenic. They hold the baby output very well. They did not leak and the elastic near the baby will not irritate. There is a double gasket for protection around the legs. I like the way the tabs work, easy to open and close for readjustment.

15.name: MBK
15.date: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2025
15.title: Cute prints!
15.review: These are cute prints! The flower child one is a bit feminine, but I still put my son in them. My kid is on the smaller size of the weight for a size 4. I found that when he had poops he sometimes leaked the tiniest bit around the leg holes. There is no blowout guard at the top of the back for those wondering. Generally absorbent, but not so much so that I can use it as an overnight diaper.

16.name: MS
16.date: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2025
16.title: Well made
16.review: These diapers in size 6 are a solid choice for parents seeking a balance between comfort and reliability. This is my first time trying this brand. The hypoallergenic material is gentle on sensitive skin, and the soft, cloth-like feel adds a touch of luxury. They fit well and handle most messes effectively, though occasional leaks can happen overnight. They stick well too! The adorable “Flower Child” design is a fun bonus, making diaper changes a little more cheerful. While slightly pricier than some alternatives, the quality, medium thickness, and thoughtful design make these diapers worth considering. They’re not super bulky, which is great.

17.name: Tonilynn Rosario
17.date: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2025
17.title: Premium Hello Bello diapers
17.review:
This box comes with 68 diapers that are packaged 17 per bag. The bag they come in is see through and the diapers design is geared for girls. These have a blue line that is noticeable once the diapers are wet with urine. The diapers are soft and has a great leg fit. These were a bit small for niece who wears a 6 ( my opinion these could be a size 5 fit) the velcro is snug and hold up really well , but once wet I feel that there is no dry wicking to get urine off of child and would need to be changed right after.
I do like how soft these are against my granddaughters , but as far as saving me money they just fall short. The price point is average for each package of 17 diapers nothing that would make me change current diapers.

18.name: SoCalGirl
18.date: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2025
18.title: Super Soft, Not the Most Absorbent
18.review:
The Hello Bello Wild Cats diapers feature an adorable design and are incredibly soft and comfortable, with plenty of stretch in the leg elastics. The tabs stay secure in place, and they fit my 10-pound niece perfectly. Plus, they're free from harmful chemicals, and the company's values aligns well with our family's.

However, compared to my sister's usual brand, these diapers are slightly thinner and less absorbent. While they've remained accident-free after a week of use, my sister is hesitant to switch brands and wants to see how well these diapers perform as her baby approaches the 12-pound upper weight limit.

19.name: KristyMc
19.date: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2025
19.title: Good alternative to bigger brands
19.review: I'm always looking to support better, mindful products that don't use a ton of unnecessary chemicals in their items, and these looked to be a good alternative. They are indeed very soft, but not as thick nor absorbent as the big name established brands. However, for a child is who is starting to transition away from diapers, these are a very good option.

20.name: Amb
20.date: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2024
20.title: Super soft, but not as absorbent as I'd like
20.review: They’re a little taller than the brand name ones we usually get, but not by much, so it works out for my daughter when she’s between sizes. The diapers are softer than the others we use, though a bit thinner. She’s potty training so we haven’t had a lot of soaked diapers. Out of the ones we did have, only two leaked a bit. I'm not sure if it matters, but both times she was sleeping on her belly and some of the wetness was felt through the front of her diaper, not around her legs. I think it’s from how thin the diapers are. Overall they’re fine for her during the day since they’re not getting too wet with the frequent potty visits, but overnight there may be some small leaks.

21.name: Amazon Customer
21.date: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2024
21.title: No blow out barrier in the back
21.review: Overall, I love these diapers! The price of $0.28/diaper is comparable to what I pay for Huggies and Pampers, but these have better ingredients and super cute designs. I’ve tried at least 5 different kinds of diapers lately because we keep having issues with blow outs. These diapers are soft and stretchy. The tabs stretch and pull tightly for a nice fit. I don’t have much of an issue with leaks on the sides, and never any issues with urine only, but I’m still getting blow outs up the back. At this point, I think it might be time to size up, but there also isn’t a barrier pocket in the back to keep everything in the diaper. My son is 11 pounds so I got a size 1.

22.name: Consumer
22.date: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2024
22.title: Great fit for big kids
22.review: These are really fun diapers that make my 4 year old feel less awkward about still needing to wear diapers to sleep. She is big for her age (about 43 inches, 43 pounds) so we are starting to have a hard time finding something that fits well and is absorbent enough to last all night, but these really fit the bill. They are very soft inside - actually softer than the cloth diapers we used when our kids were babies, almost like a tissue, but have been absorbent so far. It's not a big deal in our case but I was surprised that they don't have a wetness indicator, which might be a game changer for an infant or younger kid.

23.name: DEEDEE
23.date: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2025
23.title: Awesome
23.review: So far the qualities these diapers are good my baby hasn’t had any rash issues as of right now they work perfectly fine. They hold the pee. they hold #2 they’re perfect.

24.name: Steven Chang
24.date: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2024
24.title: Soft, Hypoallergenic Baby Diapers with Adorable Prints
24.review:
These disposable baby diapers are of excellent quality, featuring an adorable wild cats print. I love that they are hypoallergenic, making them gentle on sensitive skin, and they feel incredibly soft to the touch.

The diapers also absorb quickly, and so far, we haven’t experienced any leakage issues. A reliable and stylish choice for parents looking for comfort and protection for their little ones.

25.name: Ki
25.date: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2024
25.title: Soft cloth feel, cute print, basic diaper
25.review: These diapers have a unique soft cloth like feel and mine had a really cute flower print on them. Although you don't really see the print with pants on, it is a cute touch. I didn't have any issues with leakage or skin irritation so far, they have a standard cuff inside to help with that. The only drawback is the price is higher than compared to other big box brands. However, if you eco-friendly purchases are important to you, these are a good option helping the cause. I know a few of my friends would like these as an option too.

26.name: Cam
26.date: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2025
26.title: Good price
26.review: These are great diapers for the price. They don’t leak but I feel like they don’t hold as much as other brands. They are soft and have cute designs.

27.name: Scott
27.date: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2024
27.title: Diapers
27.review: Diapers are not cheap and these seem decent enough with a cute pattern although most people don’t care about the pattern but the leakage protection. I wouldn’t say they are up there with the premium diapers but they are ok and do what they are supposed to do.

28.name: Christine James
28.date: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2025
28.title: Ok diapers overall
28.review: We love trying new diapers to compare to the usual brand we use. These diapers fit pretty well overall and have pretty secure attatchment tabs. The diapers were ok during the day but we had to monitor them over night after having a few leaks.

29.name: J. Lam
29.date: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2024
29.title: surprised witht he color
29.review: So typical diapers are primarily white and possible with colored decor. These are not. Don't get me wrong, they are cute and give a new breath to boring white diapers. They are super absorbent, and they are easily put on. The designs are cute and these are quite easy to dispose of in a tight smelly ball.

30.name: ✨Mr. King
30.date: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2024
30.title: Love it
30.review:
Got this for my 3 months old baby girl.
Cute and soft.
She has really sensitive skin, and this diaper won't harm her skin.
It doesn't leak.
Not that stretchable.
It is also kind of thin.
It is okay now for my baby girl, as I change her diaper every time when it is wet.
If it is for older stage of baby, it might not be a good option as it is kind of thin.
It won't absorb as much, and might cause leakages.

31.name: Scientific Baking
31.date: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2024
31.title: Nice diapers with fun design
31.review:
Hello Bello Diapers are super cute with the flower design. They make it fun for your little one to wear. The diapers are soft. The ruffles around the leg openings are large and help prevent blowouts.

It is nice to have diapers on hand when taking care of our grandchild. This size range should last for quite awhile.

32.name: Reviewer
32.date: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2024
32.title: Premium Diapers!
32.review: Hello Bello Diapers have the cutest prints! I just love these diapers for my granddaughter. They are great for her sensitive skin and she has had no breakouts from them. The only downside is they are not as absorbent as other diapers we have used. So far she has not had any major leaks but I think as she gets older that could be a problem with these diapers. They seem a little skinnier than other diapers.

33.name: GummyCats
33.date: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2025
33.title: Love these diapers, but not for nighttime.
33.review:
I love these diapers for daytime because they’re thin, seem far more comfortable for baby, and they’re adorable. But for nighttime they leak. So a more padded diaper for nighttime and these diapers for move-ability and comfort for the daytime.
These do not bother the baby’s skin at all whether it’s dry or wet which is amazing.
I feel very comfortable with these diapers and this brand.

34.name: Jenna H
34.date: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2024
34.title: Love the design
34.review: A design on a diaper isn't necessary but it adds a bit of fun to something that isn't always fun to take care of. These adorable flower prints bring a bit of whimsy to your day. Comparable to several diaper brands on a price per diaper although a bit higher than I try to go typically. We've had no issues with absorbency and they fit our little one well.

35.name: QuirkyGal
35.date: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2025
35.title: Cute print, accurate sizing, underperform compared to Pampers
35.review: These diapers are cute and good, but do not hold as much liquid as Pampers or Kirkland brand. However, they are supposed to be made with safer materials, so the trade off depends on what you are looking for from a diaper. The sunflower print is super cute. I find that they can leak if you don’t change after one pee though. They are true to size. I like them over all, but wish the price point was lower considering performance.

36.name: Suzanne R. Arnholt
36.date: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2025
36.title: They work
36.review: These are being used on a 5 month old baby, and they work as diapers should. They contain output and don't irritate the little one's skin. Seal easily, no problems.

37.name: Liz785
37.date: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2025
37.title: Great Diapers
37.review: This is my first time trying HelloBello diapers for our baby, and so far so good! We haven’t had any diaper rash issues, and these hold a good amount of moisture - she can wear them through the night and there are no leaks. We have had a few blowouts, however we have learned they are unavoidable at times. They are nice and stretchy, and not too thick. The designs on the diapers are an added bonus, and the price is fair for a more premium diaper.

38.name: M.G
38.date: Reviewed in the United States on February 20, 2025
38.title: Absorbent & Adorable!
38.review: Flower child is a simple and elegant design, appreciate the fact that these are chemical free. They are very gentle on my toddler's skin. No rashes its super soft and holds his pee well. Been using for almost a month, no leak yet. Good quality product.

39.name: StevenJM
39.date: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2025
39.title: High quality
39.review:
High quality diapers from a good alternative to standard brands. Has all the features of the name brands with a softer feel. This particular version is very colorful with flowers on a pink background.

The tabs hold firm and the feel against the baby's skin is soft. The diapers hold liquid and solid waste very well. Decent price too.

40.name: Chrystal Cyhaung
40.date: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2025
40.title: love those diaper
40.review: Hello Bello offers a value pack of their premium disposable baby diapers in Size 6, designed for babies weighing up to 35 pounds. This particular pack, featuring the charming "Flower Child" design, contains 68 diapers that are not only hypoallergenic but also crafted with a soft, cloth-like texture for enhanced comfort. Having purchased these diapers previously, I can confidently attest to their excellent quality, making them a reliable choice for parents seeking both functionality and gentleness for their little ones.

41.name: Bria
41.date: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2025
41.title: Great diapers
41.review:
They’re super soft and gentle on my kiddos skin. They fit well and aren't too tight.
The design options are really cute too. These are surprisingly absorbent given how sustainable the brand is. I didn't expect this level of quality at all!
I love that they’re hypoallergenic and have a very soft feel.
We really like these diapers for their moderate price point and their luxurious quality!

42.name: Customer Review of Product
42.date: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2025
42.title: Great diapers that do what they're supposed to
42.review:
These diapers fit really well without being too binding. They were snug without leaving any marks on baby. Because they fit in all the right places, there was no leaking, and I was really pleased with the absorbency of the diapers. They are super soft, too, and feel good to the touch. Baby has had no issues with diaper rash or irritation with these diapers.

They are good looking, too! I'm buying some more for an expectant friend who fell in love with them!

43.name: Mike
43.date: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2025
43.title: very good
43.review:
Great diapers. The fit very well and looks like they stay in place. The absorbency is great and there were no leak issues. They feel very soft too touch. The material feels good on skin.
The print is a really nice addition too.
Considering you get 128 nappies in the pack I think they're pretty affordable.
I'd definitely recommend them.

44.name: L. Hill
44.date: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2025
44.title: Great diapers!
44.review: These are really great diapers, I am impressed at the value for the cost. They are soft, have cute patterns, they fit securely and comfortably, and we haven't had any issues with leaks using these, and stored moisture doesn't seem to get to places where it can cause irritation, if that makes sense. They are well designed, and we are very happy with them!

45.name: Chickadee Chatter
45.date: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2025
45.title: Hello Bello Diapers, Size 6 (35 lbs)
45.review: These prints are super cute. They seem to fit comfortably and stay in place even with lots of movement. They prevent most leaks and do what they’re supposed to do. They’re kind of spendy, but diapers are kind of spendy and I like that these work well.

46.name: Jeanette
46.date: Reviewed in the United States on February 24, 2025
46.title: Hello Bello
46.review: These diapers have worked great. They seem comfortable and absorbent.

47.name: K K OBrien
47.date: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2025
47.title: One of our favorite diaper brands!
47.review:
Love Hello Bello and recently sized up to 3s and have been super pleased with the bulk pack we were able to get. Always nice to have extras on hand! Of course the cute designs are a fun feature but more importantly these diapers are good where it really matters - comfort and absorbency!

These diapers are soft to the touch, structured perfectly to fit well and prevent leaks, and of course have a lot of power when it comes to absorbing pee! Overall these diapers have been great for us from infancy into the crawling stage where diapers really get put to the test with a wiggly and always moving baby!

48.name: Joshua Tuano
48.date: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2025
48.title: Comparible to Huggies-branded diapers
48.review:
The diapers are pretty flexible and comfortable for my toddler. In terms of smell, it smells like your usual Huggies diaper, and is good at hiding odors and containing leaks.

The orange/yellow color is a nice touch, and the made in USA label gives an extra bit of confidence that this is a product made by someone who cares.

49.name: Miranda
49.date: Reviewed in the United States on November 24, 2024
49.title: Hello Bello Premium Diapers
49.review: These Hello Bello Premium Diapers come in a huge pack of 84 diapers. I got a size 4 and they fit well. They're absorbent and they seem comfortable to wear. They're hypoallergenic so they help with diaper rash. They have cute little designs on them. These would make a great gift for someone. They're also plant-based and safe to use on babies delicate skin.

50.name: CalmVibes
50.date: Reviewed in the United States on November 3, 2024
50.title: Soft but not absorbent
50.review:
Pros:
- Very soft
- ⁠Cute design
- ⁠No odor
- ⁠The blowout barrier ruffles are very wide

Cons:
- No wetness indicator (does not have the yellow/blue line that many other brands have)
- ⁠Feels less absorbent. When I change my baby’s diapers after using these, his skin seems more irritated, red, and wrinkly than when using Huggies or Kirkland.

51.name: Caroline
51.date: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2025
51.title: well absorb and soft diapers
51.review: These diapers are soft for my 3 month-old boy. They absorb well without any leak. The size runs well and tapes are strong for active babies moving a lot.

52.name: Adri Bee
52.date: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2025
52.title: Diapers
52.review: These diapers have a cute floral deisgn, would be great to keep for your child, or even gifting as a baby shower present! There was no skin irritation, leakage, and they are a good quality for the price

53.name: Crystal
53.date: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2025
53.title: Amazing Quality Diapers
53.review: These diapers are simply amazing. I’ve struggled with other diapers and constant blowouts but haven’t had any issues with these. They have great absorbency and don’t seem to leak like other diapers I’ve experienced. They’re also very gentle on my toddler's skin and she is not irritated by them. They’re very soft and have a thick quilt like feel to them and fit perfectly. They also have cute designs although to me that doesn’t matter as much. They’re worth the extra cost for a high-quality diaper.

54.name: Bella Roberts
54.date: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2025
54.title: No blowouts
54.review: I really like these have so much protection against blowouts while being able to ensure that we are using health diapers on my newborn.

55.name: JSFox
55.date: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2025
55.title: Great diapers, soft on baby skin
55.review: I've never tried this brand before and decided I'd check them out for my 19 month-old. The size 4 was true to size and the cute, bright colors and design were the first thing I noticed when I opened the box. They are all over a bright red/orange color with sunflowers all over. Super cute! I haven't had any problems with leaks (even after long days away from home with my baby when it's hard to get regular diaper changes done). Sometimes other brands I use have scratchy spots on the waistband that irritate my baby's skin, but I haven't noticed problems with these. The tabs for securing the diaper haven't torn or come off which is also nice to not have to deal with in the middle of a frantic, wiggly diaper change battle! I'd say these are definitely some of the better diapers I've used.

56.name: Mama Bean
56.date: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2024
56.title: Durable, soft, catches the mess
56.review: As a mom, grandma, and child care provider I have made a life and career out of changing diapers. I've used all kinds of brands at all kinds of price points, and have definite preferences for specific brands and details about diapers. The material they're made from is fragrance free, not easy to tear (the instant rage that comes from accidentally tearing off a tab? omg) and is super soft. I haven't had any major instances of leakage or blowouts as of yet, but hopefully they will be up to the challenge. The print on them is very cute, too. Thus far I am pleased with the quality of these diapers, and hope to continue to be in the future.

57.name: Katie
57.date: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2025
57.title: Good product
57.review: Love these diapers! These are a great product and hold up really well. Glad to have them!

58.name: Honest Reviewer
58.date: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2025
58.title: Great quality and cute
58.review: These are a nice quality and hold well. My son frequently has loose stools and we have not had any blowouts. I do think next time I am going to size up though. He is only 24 pounds but we typically use Walmart's brand of diapers and these fit slightly more snug. I cannot speak for the smaller sizes but they're not quite as soft as I would expect out of a higher end diaper.

59.name: Steph
59.date: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2025
59.title: Good quality diapers
59.review: I picked this up for an infant in my life, and mama is very happy with these. They are quite absorbent and, so far, no reports of any leakage, much like other diapers on the market. What sets these apart is the fun design, it just adds a little bit of levity to diaper changing time.

60.name: K.
60.date: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2025
60.title: Very Absorbent - Cute Design
60.review: These diapers work great! They’re super absorbent and keep leaks at bay, even overnight, which is a big deal for us. The soft, cloth-like material feels gentle on my child’s sensitive skin, and we haven’t experienced any irritation or rashes. I also love the cute design - it adds a fun touch to diaper changes. Overall, they’re reliable, comfortable, and worth the investment!

61.name: Painter Person
61.date: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2025
61.title: Did the job
61.review: Ordered these to have on hand as extras for when some of our little ones come visiting. These are whimsical (cute design!) and they did hold in the "deposits" during our visiting times. Can't speak about overnights or long trips with them, but they surely did well during use during hours-long visits and I am glad to have them on hand!!

62.name: Lady Love Dr
62.date: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2025
62.title: Great diapers
62.review: These diapers are amazing. I really like them. There were no leaks and they seemed very comfortable for my little guy. They absorbed a lot and were easy to get in and off. Great value.

63.name: Sasha
63.date: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2025
63.title: Favorite Diapers
63.review: These diapers are just as good as any name brands out there. They handle blowouts and multiple pees during the night!

64.name: Retired Rosie
64.date: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2025
64.title: Best diapers ever
64.review:
Two years ago, I found Hello Bello diapers at a local store. They were grinch decorated so I just had to get them for my new grand baby. We haven't looked back since. Hello Bello and the Honest brands are the BEST disposables we've tried. They don't leak, hold a LOT and have never caused a rash. We actually tried a more expensive, supposedly organic brand real cotton brand that caused a rash on the baby. we didn't think it could be them until after 2 dr visits and the only thing left was the diapers.

The Hello Bello (and Honest) brand is wonderful! Once you try them and your baby does well with them, it's not worth chancing a rash or an allergy to save a few pennies, or to even spend more. When you find something that works, stick with it! That's what we're doing!

65.name: Jeff C
65.date: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2025
65.title: Good Quality Diapers
65.review: Good quality on par with other name brands.

66.name: cirkatianrhythm
66.date: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2025
66.title: Diapers
66.review: I purchased these to donate to my local food pantry so I don't have firsthand experience to share, but I can say that they look to be very high quality. Pattern is bright and cute and the diaper seems soft.

67.name: BillRVC
67.date: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2025
67.title: The do what diapers are supposed to do
67.review: The fit was good with my one year old grand daughter. The printed characters are cut though that doesn't really matter. They stood up well to what she could deliver.

68.name: CustomWebProgrammer
68.date: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2025
68.title: Hypoallergenic Is Very Helpful
68.review: I volunteer for a charity that provides diapers to needy families. We receive requests and information about certain diapers causing skin irritations on babies’ little bottoms. I was tasked with finding hypoallergenic diapers online. I not heard of this brand of diapers before. The value was good for the money available. When compared to other diapers of the same size, the size and rip resistance were good. A client appreciated these extra effort to helping her daughter and the skin protection was much better. Our organization is planning to order more. I find the design much cuter than other diapers online brands.

69.name: De N
69.date: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2025
69.title: So much cuter than plain white diapers
69.review: These diapers are soft and about as absorbent as other brands. They look much cuter than plain white diapers. They stay on well while baby is playing around the house. I plan to order more of these.

70.name: Momma 🐝
70.date: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2025
70.title: Great diapers
70.review: These hold up well overnight (no leaks or rips). Securing easily and staying secured. The fit seems to be comfortable and the best part is, they're clean! No yucky chemicals.

71.name: JM
71.date: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2025
71.title: Very nice diapers
71.review: As someone who has been loyal to a single brand of diaper, I am very happy to report that these diapers work very well, and do not cause any kind of diaper rash or issues. They fit well and accommodate a significant amount of growth thanks to the saysing design. They also have not caused any irritation and seem to soak up liquids very well and quick enough to prevent leakage so far. I also think the little tiger design is super cute. Overall I’m very happy with the quality.

72.name: Amazon Customer
72.date: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2024
72.title: Size 4 diapers
72.review:
At this size of diaper most children are very mobile.

I'd compare this diaper to a more natural and cuter pampers swaddler. It is definalty adequate for most littles with no leaks, it is best for pre potty trained as the tabs still give the diaper feel, price is ok for a natural diaper but there are cheaper options our there, quality is great, pattern is cute, since it's natural materials it's good for senstive skin, diaper is of similar thickness to huggies natural care so it shouldn't be bothersome, no leaks so far, stretchy enough to handle movement of.toddler.

73.name: PDP
73.date: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2024
73.title: Cute Wild Cats Print Design – Good Adhesive Tabs – Soft & Gentle On Skin
73.review:
I think these Wild Cats themed Hello Bello diapers are pretty nicely designed. The adhesive tabs appear to work well. The soft padded material is gentle on the skin and seems to be reasonably absorbent. The elastic around the legs has a good amount of stretchiness to it, and it seems to provide for a decent fit that would help prevent leaks. The printed Wild Cats design is fun, and it’s a nice change from the plain white diapers we normally see.

I am keeping a few of these on hand for when my nieces and nephews visit. The rest are going in a gift basket I’m putting together for my sister who had a little girl a couple months ago. It may be a while before she can use these, but babies grow so quickly, and having a good range of diaper sizes available will be very helpful for her. I’m happy with the apparent quality of these diapers, to the extent that I’ve been able to test their absorbency, the adhesive tabs, and feel how soft they are. I think these are a pretty reasonable value for a pack of 100.

74.name: B. Bender
74.date: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2025
74.title: Very cute
74.review: These diapers are very cute, I love the design on them. They work well and just like I expected. I like that the legs have two rows of elastic but still very soft.

75.name: Nate
75.date: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2024
75.title: Good value for 100-pack
75.review:
These diapers work as well as any others I’ve used. I personally don’t have kids, but I have 3 nephews (and one on the way) who use them. So I got them to keep on hand when they visit or I babysit. So while, I’m no diaper expert, I’ve had no issues with these. They fit nicely and hold any messes. I’ve not had any issues with leaking or irritation. I know enough to realize diapers can be quite pricey, so I think these are definitely a good value for a 100-pack.

Thanks for reading my review. I hope you found it helpful.

76.name: MarkNotMarc
76.date: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2025
76.title: Soft, Cute, and Reliable!
76.review: Hello Bello diapers are fantastic! They’re super soft and form perfectly around my baby’s legs for a secure fit. The designs are adorable, and best of all, we haven’t had a single blowout since we started using them—even though we’ve had a few close calls! These are now our go-to diapers for comfort and reliability. Highly recommend!

77.name: haunted S
77.date: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2025
77.title: premium disposable diapers
77.review: this is well made and the quality is good. It does contain pee and poop well. Have been using for a month and no complaints yet. the packaging was really good too.

78.name: Mulberry
78.date: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2025
78.title: Definitely soft!
78.review: First time using the Hello Bello Diapers size 5 for 27+ lbs. The design was a fun and bright lion and tiger print. I love the softness of this brand along with the double leakproof protection around the legs. Has a wetness indicator stripe that runs along the backside and up the front of the diaper. The overall softness without the plastic is what sold me on this product. Made in USA.

79.name: Sterling
79.date: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2025
79.title: Nice
79.review: I like that they're natural and hypoallergenic. Very soft material and doesn't seem to bother my baby at all. Comes in a 100 pack, which seems like a great amount, till you start going through them. I still like Huggies, but these were nice to try.

80.name: Austin Cho
80.date: Reviewed in the United States on November 3, 2024
80.title: Came with good amount for money, no leaks
80.review: This came with a healthy amount of diapers and they didn’t leak at all.

81.name: G. Baggett
81.date: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2025
81.title: Really Nice!
81.review: I really liked these diapers. They were very absorbent, easy to put on, and didn't seem uncomfortable or to bother my 2-year-old daughter. I will buy more of these.

82.name: LNM
82.date: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2024
82.title: Cute and work well
82.review: I love the flower design on these. They are absorbent and feel soft to the touch. Pricey but I can see why they're considered premium.

83.name: Tyler
83.date: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2025
83.title: Well made, cute patterns!
83.review: Awesome diapers, hold in all the messes! Pretty easy to get off and on and feels high quality. Cute designs too! Feels just as good if not better than the other big brands.

84.name: Simon
84.date: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2025
84.title: No More Leaks
84.review: Fits very well, my toddler had several big poops in there and never leaked. The print is also cute. The thickness is just right.

85.name: Jen
85.date: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2025
85.title: Soft
85.review: These diapers are so soft, and compare also to Millie moon for a fraction of the price. We have not had any blowouts or leaks and the pad is thick! They are good quality and fit my baby super well. My only gripe is that the bright color does show through light colored clothing. But overall these are great and work well!

86.name: JJB
86.date: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2025
86.title: So cute!
86.review: Our first grandchild is coming in a few short months and seeing these cute diapers, I couldn’t resist ordering. Of course, I am unable to address performance at this time, but I can say that they feel very soft, have no fragrance (which we prefer), and are so cute. I will update on our experience with using them after the baby arrives and grows into these size 3, which I’m sure won’t take long!

87.name: Kindle Customer
87.date: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2024
87.title: Nice and soft!
87.review:
These are really cute little diapers, if not a bit girly, but considering what they're used for, does it really matter?

I like that they are nice and soft, and the velcro-type fasteners will make it easy to adjust as needed, ensuring a good fit.

88.name: Destiny
88.date: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2024
88.title: Perfect for little one!
88.review: Very absorbent! Fits to size and seems to be of good quality. Overall would recommend for mamas needing new diapers for their little ones!

89.name: Erika H
89.date: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2025
89.title: Absorbent
89.review: These diapers are soft and absorbent. We haven’t had any issues with leaks or ‘explosions’ while using this brand. I love the fun pattern. It hasn’t caused any issues with my baby’s sensitive skin, so it’s a win!

90.name: a human being
90.date: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2025
90.title: Work great
90.review: My toddler is transitioning out of diapers but we still needed one more box to have on hand, and these work perfectly. They’re thin enough to fit my very active toddlers body while still absorbent enough to hold the pee from their growing bladder. They’re very soft and we haven’t had any irritation marks anywhere, which is a nice change from some of the pull-ups out there that make my kiddos hips itch. The pattern is very cute as well, though maybe more geared towards girls if you care about such things.

91.name: PurpleAce
91.date: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2025
91.title: Nice diapers
91.review: I like how it comes with so many and it’s a good price. I got these for a diaper raffle for a baby shower.

92.name: Karen R. Dailey
92.date: Reviewed in the United States on October 7, 2024
92.title: High quality diapers - but you pay for it!
92.review: We are very pleased with these in terms of quality. They are durable, very absorbent, great fit, and have a fun design. If you want a top notch diaper for your kiddo, these are perfect for you (especially with the hypoallergenic and eco-friendly perks). The one drawback is the price. We will probably continue to use our more budget friendly brand, but can't deny how good these are!

93.name: DRW
93.date: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2024
93.title: Work great
93.review: These work as well as most other diapers, but have neat little designs on them. Overall, I'm pleased with the performance and haven't experienced any leaks or issues.

94.name: Mary
94.date: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2024
94.title: Good Quality
94.review: These are good diapers. I like the print and they have been holding up well. They are not high end but are good for the price.

95.name: OneByOne
95.date: Reviewed in the United States on October 14, 2024
95.title: good quality
95.review:
Hello Bello Premium Diapers Size 5 I 18 Count (Pack of 4) Disposable, Extra-Absorbent, Hypoallergenic, and Eco-Friendly Baby Diapers with Snug and Comfort Fit I SunnySide Up Pattern Value Pack (72 CT)

The diaper was soft and absorbed well.
The fit can be adjusted by the velcro.

96.name: Manila Mike
96.date: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2025
96.title: MAXimum Protection
96.review: Max has no complaints with these Hello Bello Diapers. The fit is great. No signs of discomfort. The waist and leg stretch systems are flawless. The velcro-like fasteners hold and re-hold well. We have not encountered a load that these diapers could not adequately accommodate but still go with others for night-time use. Even the Wild Cat design puts a smile on Max's face.

97.name: Jon
97.date: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2024
97.title: Works!
97.review:
The Hello Bello Diapers, Size 6 (Flower Child) are like a stylish and comfy upgrade for your baby’s bottom. With their adorable flower design and super soft, cloth-like feel, these diapers are perfect for keeping your little one both comfortable and fashionable. The hypoallergenic materials make them a great choice for sensitive skin, ensuring a rash-free experience even during extended wear.

These diapers provide excellent absorbency, handling nighttime accidents or those “extra-special” moments with ease. The stretchy sides and secure tabs make for a snug, yet breathable fit that keeps up with all the wiggling, crawling, and running your baby can muster.

I used these for my toddler, and they held up impressively through all sorts of activities, from wild playtime to peaceful naps. Plus, the flower pattern added a bit of fun—because who says diapers can’t be cute?

If you’re looking for reliable, eco-conscious diapers that don’t sacrifice style for performance, this value pack is a fantastic choice. Just be ready to hear, “Where did you get those adorable diapers?” during your next playdate!

98.name: Twin Mom
98.date: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2025
98.title: Great diapers!
98.review: These diapers work really well and do not irritate the skin. Very pleased!

99.name: Megan Elle
99.date: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2024
99.title: Great diapers.
99.review: These are great diapers. Nice quality. The sizing is correct. Cute pattern. No leakage. Easy to use during a diaper change. And a nice value for the price.

100.name: Rob
100.date: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2025
100.title: Hello Bello
100.review: Hello Bell has the cutest prints! They are very absorbent & you don’t have to deal with leaks unlike some diaper brands.

2.product_name: Baby Diapers - Size 1 (4-11 lbs), Monthly Supply (224 Count), Leak Protection, Skin-Friendly, Ultrasoft, Perfume- & Chlorine-Free, Hypoallergenic, dermatologically tested, OEKO-TEX®

1.name: Büşra iplikci
1.date: Reviewed in the United States on February 22, 2025
1.title: Works as good as bestselling brands
1.review: I have been using the the best selling diaper brand for more than a year but they kept leaking during the night. So rather than paying that amount I was in search of a mire affordable but working well diapers. I came across this brand and decided to give it a try. I saw earlier comments says it leaks but it was on sale and I said lets try this. Yes they are thin diapers but it doesn’t mean they will leak. Actually worked way more better than the best selling brand we have been using. I also like the texture it is so soft. I will follow for sales👍🏻

2.name: Melanie
2.date: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2025
2.title: 5 star customer service
2.review:
The seller was attentive to my review and offered a refund. I appreciate their customer service and willingness to make it right, I guess you could say. 5 stars for customer service. I Iike how soft these are and the material they are made of but for some dumb reason there is a channel all throughout the diapers where the material is that would otherwise soak up pee. Why would you skimp on the absorbant part of a diaper?

We realized this when our baby had diarrhea and it kept leaking out the sides of the diaper. Also the tabs to close the diaper are kind of narrow and small so the front of the diaper gets kinda wonky if your baby likes to move around. If these two things weren't an issue I'd give 5 stars and purchase again. But for now we will go back to huggies.

3.name: CoCo
3.date: Reviewed in the United States on September 25, 2024
3.title: Not good.
3.review: I hate to give small businesses bad reviews but these are not good. The diaper on the left is the lily moon. I put it next to another size 5 diaper (dyper brand). It is very thin. You can see through it. I tried this and these were blow out central. Possibly because they run smaller than average size 5. My baby is not chunky. He’s average size for his age and these were small. If you get them definitely size up especially if you have a chunky kiddo. They were fine for pee but you’ll definitely change them a lot as they are quite thin. They didnt seem to keep him as dry as I prefer. Overall I did not really like anything about them. I was trying to find something cheaper but good enough these won’t work. Honest diapers are better than these and those to me aren’t good. I tried to be as thorough as possible because these are things I was looking for in reviews. I hope this business can take this review into account and make the diapers better.

4.name: c
4.date: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2025
4.title: really soft!
4.review:
I love this diaper... but my baby des not.
the diaper is very soft both inside and out. it is gentle on my baby's skin. it also appears very absorbent. The issue for the baby.... she wants to be change more frequently so we are going through diapers much faster than usual. She wakes up everything she wets.

5.name: Kelsey
5.date: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2025
5.title: Great buy - no leaks!
5.review: Wow! Great product. Was hesitant to try at first because some other reviews said the diapers were thin and leaked. I decided to buy some anyways and give it a try because of the price and how these diapers were made with cleaner ingredients. So glad I bought a box! We've been using them for a month now and we've had NO issues so far. While they do seem thinner than other diapers, but there have been no leaks or blowouts. The price right now is amazing. They're also made with a cute simple print print design as well. Will definitely keep buying!

6.name: Elizabeth Love
6.date: Reviewed in the United States on February 16, 2025
6.title: No thanks
6.review:
Not really a fan or these. I’m one of those moms that constantly change diapers. I’m not leaving it on in order to save money and the reason I’m not a fan is 1) they don’t have a pre indicator. You know how some other diapers have a line that changes color to indicate wetness. This does not have that at all. These feel like a cheap plant material used. I’m all for helping the environment but not if I have to use 10x more diapers…
2) it just doesn’t feel like an absorbent product. Her skin always feels wet.
3) not the best for overnight. She now sleeps through the night so I don’t get up as often but when I do it’s because she’s peed through the diaper because it’s not that absorbent. Gotta constantly change them anyway.
I gave 2 stars because I didn’t want to be “mean”… but yeah we aren’t buying these again. They are 💩 diapers.

7.name: Brooke P.
7.date: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2025
7.title: They are OKAY
7.review:
I really wanted to love these but they are just okay. I usually use Millie Moon but don’t like that they aren’t TCF , plus these were a price I couldn’t turn down! My little is 8 weeks, in a size 2. I have been using these for 3 days during the day only. I do not trust them enough for night time. So far I have had 2 leaks with these.

Here’s how they compare to Millie Moon diapers:
1) Not as soft but softer than pamper swaddlers
2) Doesn’t seem to hold as much urine and clothes seem to get damp… I change diapers at a minimum every 2 hours … with these it seems less.
3) super thin and not as bulky
4) super stretchy but still not a tight fit on his bum

I have 175 diapers + to change my mind and will update if needed.

8.name: J
8.date: Reviewed in the United States on February 20, 2025
8.title: Good diaper
8.review: I've gotten these diapers before but got the special price this time and you can't beat it. They are soft and nice quality. They do not irritate my babies skin like other diapers do and I do not have any leaking issues.

9.name: ianimus
9.date: Reviewed in the United States on November 18, 2024
9.title: Work very well, not perfect
9.review: We started using Lillydoo diapers with our latest baby who is now 5 mo. They have worked really well for him. They are not perfect (they will leak once they reach capacity...duh) and as your baby grows you'll need to be ready to size up regularly. We cloth diaper at home and use Lillydoo diapers when we are out and at night and we have had to size up after using 80-160 diapers (currently using size 4). Our little guy is on the large side for his age. Please consider that babies come in all shapes and sizes so what works for one baby may not work for others. I do recommend to try them as they are economical and a premium quality.

10.name: Heidi
10.date: Reviewed in the United States on February 20, 2025
10.title: Great diapers!
10.review: The deal than ran on these was amazing! Now our new favorite diaper. My girl’s sensitive skin is happy. I will say I feel like they may run a tad smaller than other generic brands but that works in our favor actually:)

11.name: Avy Elder
11.date: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2025
11.title: ! Great Quality Diaper !
11.review: I was skeptical at first because of some of the reviews. However, even though these diapers are on the thinner side, they are great quality, very soft, and hold a good amount without leaking. I haven’t had any bad experiences thus far, hence the 5 star rating. The value for the money is also a huge plus for me! I use honest diapers which are a little more pricey, so to find another quality diaper that is clean and sensitive skin friendly is great :)

12.name: anna
12.date: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2025
12.title: Not too absorbent but does the job
12.review: Good quality, just doesn’t seem to be as absorbent as some of the more popular brands! Got a good price/deal so definitely worth it.

13.name: ANB
13.date: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2025
13.title: Diaper can be wrapped and fitted well
13.review:
I guess some will just think this diaper is thin and won’t hold messes? I don’t feel newborns eliminate large amounts and their diapers are getting changed often.
I am using newborn diapers on a tiny mauled dog who is energetic! I can wrap this thin yet durable diaper to stay on my live wire.
I’m retired and part of my career was newborn nursery. We had to be creative with placing diapers on preemies .
Parents are tired and we certainly don’t want having to reposition a diaper.
This diaper is easier to form around baby with great tabs. It may not be absorbent enough for a toddler, but accidents through diapers are often with poor placement.

14.name: Yolanda Jaimes Castaño
14.date: Reviewed in the United States on February 25, 2025
14.title: Funcionales para lo que los compre
14.review: Yo uso panal de tela por dentro, pero sin embargo no me le provocan alergias dermicas a mi bebe

15.name: Beth Miller
15.date: Reviewed in the United States on February 17, 2025
15.title: My new favorite.
15.review: I started using these pampers and I would never go back. I haven’t had any issues with the leaks and they seem to keep my baby dryer till morning.

16.name: Laurie Fishers
16.date: Reviewed in the United States on February 24, 2025
16.title: Great price
16.review: This is part of a gift and very happily with my purchase

17.name: Danelia G.
17.date: Reviewed in the United States on February 16, 2025
17.title: Buenisimo
17.review: A mi bebé le fue muy bien no se le sale y está toda la noche sin cambiarle el pañal

18.name: V.A.
18.date: Reviewed in the United States on September 20, 2024
18.title: Best Diapers
18.review: I did a lot of diaper research before baby was born and didn't even hear of these. Baby was born early 4 mo ago and most diapers didn't fit him, and premie were hard to find. These were found after even more searching by "ingredients" and I tried them since the price was fair. They are better than leading brands! They hold up great, they're thin but not so thin they leak, and they fit for a while so they fit small babies and larger babies! They move with baby, too! I have yet to get diaper wash between these and Babycozy wipes while letting baby air dry a few seconds before next diaper is closed. Will purchase for a while.

19.name: Katlin
19.date: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2025
19.title: So soft!
19.review: L I absolutely love these diapers for my daughter. The only problem is, when she was a newborn and around 6 pounds they were still too large for her. I wouldn’t recommend them for babies that tiny! But now that she’s bigger, the coverage is so great! Absolutely no blowout.

20.name: Emmelie
20.date: Reviewed in the United States on November 1, 2024
20.title: Finally available in the US!
20.review:
I‘ve used these diapers 6 years ago with my daughter while living in Germany. I tried so many brands and this one was the only one not giving her rashes, but also keeping her dry during day and night! We rarely had any blowouts.
Now, with my youngest, I was looking for something TCF, but also absorbent and affordable. I like a couple of different brands, but haven’t been able to find anything TCF that would last over 12h during the night. So when these diapers became available in the US, I got excited.
After almost 7 years I only remembered really loving them.
Here’re my thoughts after trying them again:
My initial thought was that I don’t remember them being so thin! I also thought they used to be softer and felt less like plastic back then.
But after putting them on over night, I love them just like I used to. They are very absorbent and pull the wetness away from the baby. They won’t feel as thin once you change baby and I like how, especially during the night, baby doesn’t have to wear a super thick diaper.
Granted, they feel more like plastic than for example pu*a diapers (orange packaging), but they’re OEKO Tex certified and TCF, so I’m okay with it, especially since it’s not like that inside. I’ll be buying again and hope they’ll soon have more cute designs available like they do in Germany!

2.date: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
2.title: Amazing
2.review:
These pull ups are just the best. We've been using the Eco Boom diapers for quite some time and made the switch to pull ups after we visited Japan and babies transition to pull up style much earlier, so we got used to them. Our son is 21 months and wearing size L.

We currently have inventory of Eco Pea pull ups in the same size, which we used with our first born, and the Eco Boom pull ups are much softer and have a better fit. The Eco Pea ones leave imprints on our son's waist and have leaked numerous times, while the Eco Boom pull ups have a higher rise and are softer all around. Not a single leak with them. My only complaint is the price fluctuation. I've set up a subscription, but it's annoying when one order is $16 and the next $21. I'm very particular about nontoxic diapers and these seem to be great quality. On a single budget though, we have to be watchful.

5.name: Brooklyn Willerth
5.date: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
5.title: We love these!
5.review:
After our previous diaper brand switched from being chlorine free to elemental chlorine for bleaching, we decided to shop around for a better choice. A friend recommended these, which are totally chlorine free, and we’ve been super pleased with them.
Our toddler is 21 months, just potty trained, and wears the pull ups at night and during naps. We have the XL size in the pull ups, which are objectively smaller than the ones we used before in the same 6 size, but fortunately they’ve been really absorbent. Our toddler is tall and almost 40lbs, and these will sometimes leave marks on her hips if she sleeps in a funny position, but they seem to fit well.
Even if she pees multiple times overnight, we haven’t had any leaking. The diapers do get cold if they’re really full (as most do), but we haven’t had leaks or wet spots. No diaper rash either.
We are really health conscious and shopped around for a brand that used clean ingredients and didn’t have fragrances or bleach, and this is the one we liked best. Also love that it ships quickly and arrives quickly as sometimes a mama forgets to order, and this saves me the hassle of going to the store.

10.name: Jenika Farrell
